activities.name: exercise
activities.description: Physical activity like walking, running, or gym

activities.name: social connection
activities.description: Call or meet with a friend

activities.name: reading
activities.description: Read a book or inspiring content

activities.name: creative hobby
activities.description: Art, music, crafting, or other creative pursuits

suggestions.title: 4-7-8 Breathing Exercise
suggestions.content: Inhale for 4 counts, hold for 7, exhale for 8. Repeat 4 times.

suggestions.title: Grounding Technique - 5 Senses
suggestions.content: Name 5 things you see, 4 you touch, 3 you hear, 2 you smell, 1 you taste.

suggestions.title: Positive Affirmation
suggestions.content: I am capable of handling whatever comes my way. I have overcome challenges before.

suggestions.title: Box Breathing
suggestions.content: Inhale for 4, hold for 4, exhale for 4, hold for 4. Repeat for 2 minutes.

suggestions.title: Progressive Muscle Relaxation
suggestions.content: Tense and release each muscle group from toes to head.

suggestions.title: Resilience Affirmation
suggestions.content: This feeling is temporary. I am strong and I will get through this.

suggestions.title: Guided Body Scan
suggestions.content: Starting at your head, mentally scan down your body, noticing and relaxing tension.

suggestions.title: Loving-Kindness Meditation
suggestions.content: Send compassion to yourself and others through gentle meditation.

sample_entries.text: Today was really stressful. Had a difficult meeting at work and couldn't stop thinking about it. Felt anxious all day. Tried going for a walk in the evening which helped a bit.
Woke up feeling sad today. Not sure why exactly, just felt down. Spent time journaling and it helped me understand that I'm missing my family. Decided to schedule a call with them.
Amazing day! Finished a big project at work and got great feedback. Feeling so accomplished and happy. Celebrated with friends. This is what I need more of in my life!
Overwhelmed by everything on my plate. Too many deadlines, too many responsibilities. Tried meditation but couldn't focus. Maybe need to say no to some things.
Peaceful morning. Did yoga and meditation. Had healthy breakfast. Feeling grounded and ready for the day. This routine is really making a difference.
